sir.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used when speaking to a man in order to be polite or show respect
sir.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: ‘Report back to me in an hour, sergeant.’ ‘Yes, sir.’
sir.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: used by children at school when speaking to or talking about a male teacher
sir.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a title used before the first name of a knight or baronet
